languages.text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Ударяет противника ногой, нанося <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g} + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Эта атака {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника на 3 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать. Цели необходимо пройти проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text:
Tritt einen Feind und fügt ihm <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-Bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
Dieser Angriff kann nicht pariert werden und {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}stößt{/g} das Ziel 3 Felder weg. Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Zähigkeit mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Tritt einen Feind und fügt ihm <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-Bonus)</u> Schaden zu.
Dieser Angriff kann nicht pariert werden und stößt das Ziel 3 Felder weg. Das Ziel mit eine Zähigkeit-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobetest{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 bestehen, da es sonst {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} wird.

languages.text:
Donne un coup de pied à un ennemi, ce qui lui inflige <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g} + bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
Cette attaque ne peut pas être parée. Elle {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} la cible de 3 cases. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Donne un coup de pied à un ennemi, ce qui lui inflige <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} + bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> points de dégâts.
Cette attaque ne peut pas être parée. Elle repousse la cible de 3 cases. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la Résistance avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -20, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.

languages.text:
猛踢敌人，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}加值）</u>。
此次攻击无法被招架，而且会将目标{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}3格。被击中的目标需要进行坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
猛踢敌人，造成的伤害等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}加值）</u>。
此次攻击无法被招架，而且会将目标推开3格。被击中的目标需要进行坚韧抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。

猛踢敌人，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}加值）</u>。
此次攻击无法被招架，而且会将目标推开3格。被击中的目标需要进行坚韧抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

languages.text:
Da una patada a un enemigo, infligiendo <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g})</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
Este ataque ignora parada y {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} al objetivo 3 casillas. El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Resistencia con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Da una patada a un enemigo, infligiendo <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g})</u> de daño.
Este ataque ignora parada y empuja al objetivo 3 casillas. El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de Resistencia con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.

languages.text:
敵を蹴り、<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}ボーナス)</u> の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
この攻撃は受け流し不可で、ターゲットを3セル分{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}。ターゲットはTGHに−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。
languages.original_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
敵を蹴り、<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}ボーナス)</u> のダメージを与える。
この攻撃は受け流し不可で、ターゲットを3セル分突き飛ばす。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}耐久力{/g}に−20のペナルティまたは{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態で、抵抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を受けなければならない。

敵を蹴り、<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}ボーナス)</u> の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
この攻撃は受け流し不可で、ターゲットを3セル分突き飛ばす。ターゲットは耐久力に−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態で、抵抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を受けなければならない。

languages.text:
Ударяет противника ногой, нанося <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g} + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Эта атака {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника на 3 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать. Цели необходимо пройти проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Ударяет противника ногой, нанося <u>(бонус ВЫН + бонус СИЛ)</u> урона.
Эта атака отбрасывает противника на 3 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать. Цели необходимо пройти проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −20. В случае провала цель оказывается опрокинута.

Ударяет противника ногой, нанося <u>(бонус ВЫН + бонус СИЛ)</u> урона.
Эта атака отбрасывает противника на 3 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать. Цели необходимо пройти проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −20. В случае провала цель оказывается опрокинута.

languages.text:
Bir düşmana tekme atarak <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}KUV{/g} bonusu)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Bu saldırı savuşturulamaz ve hedefi 3 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g}. Hedef, −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Kicks an enemy, dealing <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. The target must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
